Use ice cube trays to make frozen fruit popsicles for a healthy snack option. Simply fill each cavity with your favorite fruit, such as sliced strawberries or banana, and freeze until solid.
Create mini cupcakes by filling ice cube trays with batter and topping them with frosting and sprinkles.
Use ice cube trays to make mini taco bowls. Simply press tortilla dough into each cavity and bake until crispy.
Create mini ice cream sandwiches by filling ice cube trays with cookie dough and topping them with your favorite ice cream.
Use ice cube trays to make mini quiches. Simply fill each cavity with egg mixture and bake until set.
